knimeNode.name: QCSetIdReader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads QC set Id summary from a CSV file generated with the QCExporter.

fullDescription.intro: Reads QC set Id summary from a CSV file generated with the QCExporter.

ports.inPort: CSV file containing the QC set Id summary created by the QCExporter.
ports.outPort: Table containing the QC set Id summary.
